feed.title: Little Grand Rapids - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Little Grand Rapids
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 6 April 2023
